CHIN 101.courseDesc: Introductory Mandarin Chinese. Includes listening, speaking, and reading, with individual audiolingual practice.

CHIN 201.courseDesc: This course includes listening, speaking, reading, and writing practice, with a focus on cultural competency and conversational skills. Builds onCHIN 103.

CHIN 202.courseDesc: This course includes listening, speaking, reading, and writing practice, with a focus on cultural competency and conversational skills. Builds onCHIN 201.

CHIN 310.courseDesc: Provides advanced practice in written and oral communication, including journalistic, professional, and creative writing. Examines contemporary cultural contexts through media and news. Taught in Chinese.

CHIN 320.fullName: Introduction to Language for the Professions
CHIN 320.courseDesc: Introduction to communication skills in areas such as contemporary business, health, and law in a culturally sensitive fashion. Taught in Chinese.
CHIN 320.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 27 credits

CHIN 340.courseDesc: Introduction to the analysis of power relations and issues of (in)equality rooted in contemporary political and socio-economic systems. Taught in Chinese.
CHIN 340.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 27 credits

CHIN 350.fullName: Introduction to Language, Media, and Society
CHIN 350.courseDesc: Introduction to the role of language and media in society, including sociolinguistics, gender, media studies, and communication. Taught in Chinese.
CHIN 350.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 27 credits

CHIN 420.fullName: Advanced Topics in Language for the Professions
CHIN 420.courseDesc: Advanced communication skills in areas such as contemporary business, health, and law in a culturally sensitive fashion. Taught in Chinese. Topics will vary according to the instructor's expertise.
CHIN 420.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 27 credits

CHIN 440.fullName: Advanced Topics in Power and Resistance
CHIN 440.courseDesc: Advanced analysis of power relations and issues of (in)equality rooted in contemporary political and socio-economic systems. Taught in Chinese. Topics will vary according to the instructor's expertise.
CHIN 440.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 27 credits

CHIN 450.fullName: Advanced Topics in Language, Media, and Society
CHIN 450.courseDesc: Advanced analysis of the role of language and media in society, including sociolinguistics, gender, media studies, and communication. Taught in Chinese. Topics will vary according to the instructor's expertise.
CHIN 450.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 27 credits

CHIN I199.repeatStatus: Can be repeated multiple times for credit
